ygData.subject: Re: New Druid
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome to the Game!! The best advice I can give you is to go to the mall or department store (i went to BestBuy) and purchase Primas guide to EQ Ruins of
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome to the Game!! The best advice I can give
you is to go to the mall or department store (i went
to BestBuy) and purchase Primas guide to EQ Ruins of
Kunark. It will cost around $17 or so but is well worth
the money. I have been playing for over a year now
but still regularly refer to the guide for info. Also
it has a list of web sites you can use for more
indepth info such as quests. Good luck and Good hunting
:)<br><br>Kanjien (Havnt decided on a last name yet)<br>20th lvl WE
Ranger<br><br>Uinan D'Mortuus<br>25th lvl DE SK<br><br>Erollisi Marr
Server
